it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class PowerUpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.PowerUpController

  • class PowerUpController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the draught, the discard and the use of a power up card by a player
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Method Detail

      • handleDrawOfTwoCards

        void handleDrawOfTwoCards(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method moves two power up cards from the deck to the player's deck and then it notifies to view part
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player that want to draw the cards

      • subsitutePowerUpCards

        private java.util.ArrayList<ModelEvent.AliasCard> subsitutePowerUpCards(java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> arrayOfCard)
        This method substitutes the cards of model (power up and weapon card) with alias cards in order to send them through the socket to remote view.
        Parameters:
        arrayOfCard - Contains the cards that have to be substituted
        Returns:
        A list of alias card

      • handleDiscardOfCardToSpawn

        void handleDiscardOfCardToSpawn(DiscardPowerUpCardToSpawnEvent event)
        This method handles the draught of a power up by a player in order to be spawned in the square with the same color of the discarded card
        Parameters:
        event - It is sent by the view and contains the references to the player that want to discard.

      • findSpawnSquareWithThisColor

        SpawnSquare findSpawnSquareWithThisColor(ColorOfCard_Ammo color)
        This method finds the spawn square with the color that is passed.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the square that is found.
        Returns:
        the spawn square that has the same color of the parameter.

      • removePowerCardFromPlayerDeck

        void removePowerCardFromPlayerDeck(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                                   ModelEvent.AliasCard aliasPowerUpCard)
        This method remove the cards from player's deck because they are used or draught
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that has the deck that has to be modified
        aliasPowerUpCard - the card that has to be removed from player's deck

      • findPowerUpCardFromAliasInPlayerDeck

        private PowerUpCard findPowerUpCardFromAliasInPlayerDeck(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                                                         ModelEvent.AliasCard aliasPowerUpCard)
        This method finds the card of the model that matches with the alias card that the view has sent
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that is the owner of the card
        aliasPowerUpCard - the alias card that has to be matched with the card of the model
        Returns:
        the card of the model that matches with the alias card
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the alias card isn't owned by the player, or if the player that is passed isn't in the game

      • spawnPlayer

        void spawnPlayer(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                 ColorOfCard_Ammo color)
        This method places the player in the right spawn square and then generates the event in order to start the turn of the player
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that has to be spawned
        color - the color of the square in which the player has to be spawned
